labels.analysis: The Hugeicons MCP Server is primarily focused on providing access to and integration capabilities for Hugeicons icons. Its core functionality revolves around discovering, searching, and utilizing icons across different platforms. The available tools enable users to list, search, and retrieve platform-specific usage instructions for icons, making it a specialized resource for developers and designers who need icon integration in their applications.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Content Creation" was chosen because the server's main purpose is to assist in the visual creation and integration of icons within applications. This aligns with the category of tools that support media generation and project enhancement. No secondary labels are necessary as the server's functionality is narrowly focused on icon management. Custom labels were not needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's purpose.

tools.name: list_icons
tools.description: Get a list of all available Hugeicons icons

tools.name: search_icons
tools.description: Search for icons by name or tags. Use commas to search for multiple icons (e.g. 'home, notification, settings')

query.description: Search query to find relevant icons. Separate multiple searches with commas

tools.name: get_platform_usage
tools.description: Get platform-specific usage instructions for Hugeicons

platform.description: Platform name (react, vue, angular, svelte, react-native, flutter)

server_info_crawled.name: Hugeicons MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @hugeicons/mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Integrate Hugeicons seamlessly into your applications. Discover icons, access platform-specific usage instructions, and enhance your projects with comprehensive documentation and examples.

tools.name: list_icons
tools.description: Get a list of all available Hugeicons icons

tools.name: search_icons
tools.description: Search for icons by name or tags. Use commas to search for multiple icons (e.g. 'home, notification, settings')

tools.name: get_platform_usage
tools.description: Get platform-specific usage instructions for Hugeicons

platform.description: Platform name (react, vue, angular, svelte, react-native, flutter)

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@hugeicons/mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
